body.name: 2024 Newest HP 17 Laptop Computer, 17.3” HD+ Touchscreen Laptop PC, Intel Pentium Silver N5030, 16GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB SSD, Windows 11, 1-Year Office 365, Long Battery Life, Webcam, Wi-Fi, USB-C, Silver
features: [THOUGHTFULLY CRAFTED] The HP 17 Laptop PC features a 17.3 inch HD+ (1600x900), anti-glare touch display with a narrow bezel. Enjoy your photos, movies, and games with the crisp quality of 1.4 million pixels. A sleek and stylish design makes this eye-catching laptop easy to take anywhere. With its beautiful brushed keyboard (with numerical keypad) and new lift-hinge for more natural and comfortable typing, the thin, light and smartly designed HP 17 inch laptop looks as good as it performs

[RESPONSIVE AND RELIABLE PERFORMANCE] The 17 HP laptop with the power to surf, stream, and do so much more with the latest processor and graphics. Multitasking feels easy and fast with the performance of the latest quad-core Intel Pentium Silver N5030 processor to power through even the most processor intensive tasks. Impressive performance for creating, gaming, and entertainment. A new level of graphics performance and crisp, stunning visuals with the Intel UHD Graphics 605

[EASY MULTI-TASKING, AMPLE STORAGE] 16GB high-bandwidth DDR4 RAM to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs all at once, providing superior power for everything from multi-tasking to playing games gets a performance boost. 512GB high-speed PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD, provides fast bootup and reliable storage for your files, documents, and multimedia

[WINDOWS 11 HOME IN S MODE] Experience the most secure Windows ever built with fast boot times, increased responsiveness, and added protection against phishing and malware. Windows 11 is the place to think, express, and create in a natural way. [MAKE THE MOST OUT OF MICROSOFT OFFICE 365] Bring your ideas to life. Your creativity now gets a boost with Microsoft 365 Office - Word, Excel, and Power Point. One year subscription included

[HIGH EFFICIENCY] The windows laptop PC is sensibly optimized for productivity with 5Gbps signaling rate SuperSpeed USB-C (1) and USB-A (2), 1x HDMI, Headphone/microphone combo jack, Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth combo (Gigabit data rate), up to 8 hours of battery life and HP Fast Charge, HP True Vision 720p HD camera with privacy shutter and integrated digital microphone, HD Audio with B&O custom-tuned dual stereo speakers, PCM earphone, and 1-Year Limited Warranty
body.description: Get your hands on the latest HP 17" Touchscreen Laptop with Windows 11, ideal for business, college students, or all day use at home. With a quad-core Intel Pentium Silver N5030 processor, this laptop offers a seamless experience for both personal and professional use. This notebook laptop is perfect for those on the go, with its 17.3-inch screen size and lightweight design. It comes with a touch screen feature, which allows easy navigation and makes it great for presentations. Operation System Windows 11 Home S 64-bit, the most secure Windows ever built with fast boot times, increased responsiveness, and added protection. Easily switch to Windows 11 by clicking “Switch out of S mode” under “Activation” in Windows setting Processor Intel Pentium Silver N5030 (up to 3.1GHz burst frequency, 4MB cache, 4 cores) Memory 16 GB DDR4 RAM for easy multitasking, effortless browsing and streaming Storage 512 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD for fast bootup and ample storage Display 17.3 inch, HD+ (1600x900), anti-glare touch, BrightView, 250 nits, 60% NTSC. Enjoy your photos, movies, and games with crisp quality and vibrant visuals Graphics Intel UHD Graphics 605 - smooth visuals, energy efficiency, and reliable performance Connectivity Realtek Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth 5 combo - gigabit speed 1x USB-C (data transfer), 2x USB-A, 1x HDMI, Headphone/microphone combo Camera HP True Vision HD camera with privacy shutter. Video chat in vibrant clarity, even in low light, and make every conversation a face-to-face experience Battery Up to 8 hours runtime to let you work or play all day long, HP Fast Charge (50% charge in 45 min) Premium Design Slim, sleek silver design. Thin and light, easily portable even for a 17" pc without sacrificing power, ideal for on-the-go productivity and convenience
